name: Very poor copy of Mario
description:
My first project in Unity ever, many things to do, but I have to start with something =)

A,D - moving sideways

W,S - moving up & down on ladder

Spacebar - jumping // the longer u hold spacebar, the higher u  jump

Hint* - blocks have some hidden coins

*Bug with ladders, if u cannot climb up with w, hold w with spacebar :D
